name.title: Name
name.description: Name to appear in the Home app

http_method.title: HTTP Method
http_method.description: The HTTP method to be used to communicate with the device API.

openURL.title: Open URL
openURL.description: URL to trigger the opening of your garage

closeURL.title: Close URL
closeURL.description: URL to trigger the closing of your garage. Not required for auto close

username.title: Username
username.description: Username if HTTP authentication is enabled

password.title: Password
password.description: Password if HTTP authentication is enabled

webhookPort.title: Webhook Port
webhookPort.description: Port for local webhook server listening on <homebridgehost>:<webport>/?<status update>

openTime.title: Time to open the door
openTime.description: Time (in seconds) to simulate your garage opening

closeTime.title: Time to close the door
closeTime.description: Time (in seconds) to simulate your garage closing

autoClose.title: Auto close
autoClose.description: Whether your garage should auto-close after being opened. hasClosedSensor and hasOpenSensor must be false

autoCloseDelay.title: Auto close delay
autoCloseDelay.description: Time (in seconds) until your garage will automatically close (if enabled).

hasClosedSensor.title: Has Closed Sensor
hasClosedSensor.description: Does the door have a sensor that will fire to indicate that the door is closed

hasOpenSensor.title: Has Open Sensor
hasOpenSensor.description: Does the door have a sensor that will fire to indicate that the door is open

manufacturer.title: Manufactor
manufacturer.description: Appears under the Manufacturer field for the accessory

model.title: Model
model.description: Appears under the Model field for the accessory

debug.title: Debug mode
debug.description: Turn on debug mode, i.e. additional information will show up on the homebridge log.
